name: Omnimon X Anti-body
effect: Your Digimon with [Omnimon] in its name can digivolve into this card in your hand for a memory cost of 3, ignoring this card's digivolution requirements.[When Attacking] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with DP less than or equal to this Digimon's DP.[Opponent's Turn] When your opponent's Digimon attacks, you may trash 2 of this Digimon's digivolution cards to end the attack.
